EmailTemplate.name: Parked.2 Parked
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=future associate}},
I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.
We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
{{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Steve}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Arhancet}} Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: {{lead.EM Phone:default=703-793-6011}} f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=SArhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com
